DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy safety edoxaban patient non-valvular NVAF age 80 year older ineligible available oral anticoagulation therapy .
DOC.criteria: Patients Nonvalvular Atrial Fibrillation ( NVAF ) age 80 year older ineligible available oral anticoagulation therapy Patients active bleeding Patients poorly control hypertension Patients liver dysfunction accompany disorder blood coagulation
